p: Collections provide a time window into the past allowing exploration of changes in composition of floras (Calinger, 2015), distribution of invasive weeds or threatened species (Rivers et al., 2011; Martin et al., 2016), changes in flowering times (Davis et al., 2015) or leaf-out times (Everill et al., 2014) in response to climate change as well as to model predictions of future trends (James et al., 2018).
